name: Electro Cicin's Gleam
description: If your Fatui Electro Cicin Mage who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If Electro Cicin's Usage(s) is at least 3, then Electro Cicin will immediately deal 1 Electro DMG. (Usage(s) will be consumed, once per Round)
descriptionraw: If your $[A2404] who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color>'s $[K3] is at least 3, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color> will immediately deal 1 $[K104]. ($[K3] will be consumed, once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: If your Fatui Electro Cicin Mage who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Cicin</color>'s <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> is at least 3, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Cicin</color> will immediately deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>. (<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> will be consumed, once per Round)
